subject: Quick question about your nursing program
body:
Hi Sarah,

Noticed your hospital recently expanded the CNA program by 30% according to your press release last month.

Wondering if you're seeing any challenges with career progression for your CNAs?

Mercy Health was able to increase CNA retention by 45% through our RN pathway program that allows them to advance while working.

Would you be open to a brief call next week?

Best,
Jack

subject: Partnership opportunity
body:
Hi John,

I wanted to reach out about a potential partnership between our organizations.

We specialize in workforce education benefits and have worked with over 200 healthcare organizations.

Would you be interested in learning more?

Thanks,
Jack

subject: Free demo of our platform
body:
Hi Maria,

Quick note - we're offering free demos of our education benefits platform this month.

Interested in seeing it?

-Jack

subject: Following up
body:
Hi David,

Just following up on my previous email about our RN pathway program.

Let me know if you'd like to connect.

Jack

subject: Impressed by your retention results
body:
Hi Jennifer,

Came across your recent article about reducing turnover in the radiology department - really impressive 25% improvement!

Curious if you're looking at similar strategies for your nursing staff?

Banner Health saw a 60% reduction in nursing turnover after implementing our clinical career ladder program.

Would you be interested in exploring how this could work at your facility?

Best regards,
Jack

subject: Quick question
body:
Hi Michael,

Do you handle employee benefits at your facility?

Jack

subject: Your recent expansion
body:
Hi Lisa,

Saw that you just opened a new wing at Memorial Hospital - congratulations!

I imagine you're hiring quite a bit of clinical staff right now?

St. Luke's was able to fill 40% more positions by offering education benefits during their expansion last year.

Open to a quick conversation about how this could support your hiring goals?

Thanks,
Jack

subject: Collaboration opportunity
body:
Hi Robert,

I think there could be a great opportunity for our organizations to work together on workforce development.

We help healthcare systems retain and upskill their clinical staff.

Interested in learning more?

Jack

subject: New program for healthcare workers
body:
Hi Amanda,

We just launched a new program specifically designed for healthcare organizations.

It helps CNAs advance to RN while continuing to work full-time.

Would love to share more details if you're interested.

Best,
Jack

subject: Addressing turnover challenges
body:
Hi Chris,

Noticed your recent LinkedIn post about nursing turnover being a top concern for 2024.

Are you exploring any specific retention strategies right now?

Ohio Health reduced their first-year RN turnover from 28% to 12% using our career pathway model.

Would you be open to learning how they did it?

Regards,
Jack

subject: Let's connect
body:
Hi Emily,

Reaching out to connect about workforce education benefits for your clinical staff.

Let me know if you'd like to chat.

Jack

subject: Your training initiatives
body:
Hi Daniel,

Read about your innovative approach to LPN training in the Healthcare Leader magazine.

Wondering if you've considered extending similar pathways for your CNAs to become RNs?

Mayo Clinic achieved a 3:1 ROI on their CNA-to-RN pathway program within 18 months.

Would you be interested in discussing how this could complement your current initiatives?

Best,
Jack

subject: Employee education benefits
body:
Hi Rachel,

We help hospitals provide education benefits to their staff.

Interested in learning more about how this works?

Thanks,
Jack

subject: Workforce development solution
body:
Hi Kevin,

I wanted to introduce you to our workforce development platform for healthcare organizations.

We've helped over 200 hospitals improve retention and career advancement.

Open to a demo?

Jack

subject: Your staffing challenges
body:
Hi Michelle,

Saw the news about your facility facing staffing shortages in the ER department.

I imagine this is putting a lot of pressure on your current staff?

Scripps Health was able to reduce agency staffing costs by 55% by investing in career pathways for existing employees.

Would you be open to exploring how this could work for your organization?

Best regards,
Jack

subject: Quick intro
body:
Hi Brian,

Quick intro - we help healthcare systems with workforce education.

Let me know if you'd like to learn more.

Jack

subject: Reducing agency costs
body:
Hi Nancy,

Quick question - are you currently using agency nurses to fill gaps?

Jack

subject: Career advancement program
body:
Hi Paul,

We offer a career advancement program for healthcare workers that allows them to upskill while working.

Interested in hearing more?

Thanks,
Jack

subject: Your workforce strategy
body:
Hi Karen,

Noticed you recently posted about workforce planning being a strategic priority for 2025.

Are you considering any specific programs to support clinical career development?

UC Health implemented our platform and saw 40% more internal promotions within their first year.

Would you be interested in a quick call to discuss your workforce strategy?

Best,
Jack

subject: Partnership proposal
body:
Hi Steven,

I'd love to discuss a potential partnership around employee education benefits.

We work exclusively with healthcare organizations.

Open to connecting?

Jack
